languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}Правы вы были{/d} при первой нашей встрече, Ваш высокобродие". {n}Малгар цедит сквозь зубы.{/n} "Теперь я и сам вижу, что губернатор — ублюдок, не стоивший и капли нашей крови".

traits.locale_text: "Правы вы были при первой нашей встрече, Ваш высокобродь". {n}Малгар цедит сквозь зубы.{/n} "Я теперь и сам вижу, что губернатор наш — ублюдок, не стоивший и капли нашей крови".

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}You were right{/d} when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see that the governor is a scumbag, unworthy of even a drop of our blood."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}Правы вы были{/d} при первой нашей встрече, Ваш высокобродие". {n}Малгар цедит сквозь зубы.{/n} "Теперь я и сам вижу, что губернатор — ублюдок, не стоивший и капли нашей крови".

traits.locale_text: "You were right when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see the governor is a scumbag who isn't worth a drop of our blood."
"You were right when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see the governor is a scumbag who isn't worth a drop of our blood."
"You were right when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see that the governor is a scumbag, unworthy a drop of our blood."

"You were right when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see that the governor is a scumbag, unworthy of even a drop of our blood."
"You were right when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see that the governor is a scumbag, unworthy of even a drop of our blood."

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}Ihr hattet bei unserer ersten Begegnung recht{/d}, {mf|Sir|Madam}{n}", presst Malgar zwischen zusammengebissenen Zähnen hervor.{/n} "Ich erkenne jetzt, dass der Gouverneur ein Drecksack ist, der keinen Tropfen unseres Blutes verdient hat."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}You were right{/d} when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see that the governor is a scumbag, unworthy of even a drop of our blood."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hattet bei unserer ersten Begegnung recht, {mf|Sir|Madam}{n}", presst Malgar zwischen zusammengebissenen Zähnen hervor.{/n} "Ich erkenne jetzt, dass der Gouverneur ein Drecksack ist, der keinen Tropfen unseres Blutes verdient hat."

languages.text: « {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}Vous aviez raison{/d} la première fois qu'on s'est rencontrés, {mf|monsieur|madame}... {n}marmonne Malgar entre ses dents.{/n} Désormais, je vois le gouverneur pour ce qu'il est : une ordure indigne de la moindre goutte de notre sang. »
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}You were right{/d} when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see that the governor is a scumbag, unworthy of even a drop of our blood."

traits.locale_text: « Vous aviez raison la première fois qu'on s'est rencontrés, {mf|monsieur|madame}... {n}marmonne Malgar entre ses dents.{/n} Désormais, je vois le gouverneur pour ce qu'il est : une ordure indigne de la moindre goutte de notre sang. »

languages.text: “我们第一次见面的时候，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}您的话一点都没错{/d}，长官。”{n}马尔加咬紧牙关，嘟囔着。{/n}“现在我明白了，总督就是个人渣。他不配我们给他流血，一滴血都不配。”
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}You were right{/d} when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see that the governor is a scumbag, unworthy of even a drop of our blood."

traits.locale_text: “我们第一次见面的时候，您说得话一点都没错，长官。”{n}马尔加咬紧牙关，嘟囔着。{/n}“现在我明白了，总督就是个人渣。他不配我们给他流血，一滴血都不配。”

languages.text: 「閣下、最初にお会いしたときの{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}あなたは正しかった{/d}」{n}マルガーは歯を見せて呟く。{/n}「あの総督は一滴たりとも我々の血を一滴すらも流すに値しない卑劣漢だと、今ではわかる」
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}You were right{/d} when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see that the governor is a scumbag, unworthy of even a drop of our blood."

traits.locale_text: 「閣下、最初にお会いしたときのあなたは正しかった」{n}マルガーは歯を見せて呟く。{/n}「あの総督は一滴たりとも我々の血を流すに値しない卑劣漢だと、今ではわかる」

languages.text: «{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}Tenía razón{/d} cuando nos conocimos, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Malgar murmura entre dientes.{/n} «Ahora me doy cuenta de que el gobernador es escoria, indigno de una mísera gota de nuestra sangre».
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}You were right{/d} when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see that the governor is a scumbag, unworthy of even a drop of our blood."

traits.locale_text: «Tenía razón cuando nos conocimos, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Malgar murmura entre dientes.{/n} «Ahora me doy cuenta de que el gobernador es escoria, indigno de una gota de nuestra sangre».

languages.text: "Söylediklerinizde {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}haklıydınız{/d} efendim." {n}Malgar, dişlerinin arasından mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Valinin nasıl bir pislik olduğunu çok iyi anladım, kanımızın bir damlasına bile değmezmiş."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantFreeThinking}You were right{/d} when we first met, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar mutters through his teeth.{/n} "Now I can see that the governor is a scumbag, unworthy of even a drop of our blood."

traits.locale_text: "Söylediklerinizde haklıydınız efendim." {n}Malgar, dişlerinin arasından mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Valinin nasıl bir pislik olduğunu çok iyi anladım, kanımızın bir damlasına bile değmezmiş."
"Söylediklerinizde haklıydınız efendim." {n}Malgar, dişlerinin arasından mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Valinin nasıl bir pislik olduğunu çok iyi anladım, kanımızın bir damlasına bile değmezmiş."
